com.myscript.atk.geometry.widget

Interface GeometryWidgetApi


  • public interface GeometryWidgetApi
    This interface describes the public API of the Geometry Widget.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  GeometryWidgetApi.BooleanParameter
      Geometry View parameter taking a boolean argument.
      static class  GeometryWidgetApi.Constraint
      Types of constraints managed by the Geometry View.
      static class  GeometryWidgetApi.ConstraintBehavior
      Behaviors associated to constraints.
      static class  GeometryWidgetApi.FloatParameter
      Geometry View parameter taking a float argument.
      static interface  GeometryWidgetApi.OnConfigureListener
      Interface definition for callbacks to be invoked at the beginning and end of the configuration process.
      static interface  GeometryWidgetApi.OnEditingListener
      Interface definition for callbacks to be invoked when user is editing items in the widget.
      static interface  GeometryWidgetApi.OnPenListener
      Interface definition for callbacks to be invoked when user is writing on the widget.
      static interface  GeometryWidgetApi.OnRecognitionListener
      Interface definition for callbacks to be invoked at the beginning and end of a recognition session.
      static interface  GeometryWidgetApi.OnUndoRedoListener
      Interface definition for callbacks to be invoked when at least one of Undo/Redo stacks has changed.

    • Method Detail

      • setInkColor

        boolean setInkColor(String color)
        Set the color style of the ink.
        Parameters:
        color - Color style of the ink,
        1. in styles.css add your color sub style: 
             .primitiveMyColor
   {
     color: #123456ff;
   }
        2. use/select your color sub style like this: 
             widget.setInkColor("primitiveMyColor");
        Returns:
        true if color sub style is applied or false if style is invalid, in this case current color sub style will be unchanged.

      • setInkThickness

        boolean setInkThickness(String thickness)
        Set the thickness style of the ink.
        Parameters:
        thickness - Thickness style of the ink.
        1. in styles.css add your thickness sub style: 
              .primitiveMyThickness
    {
      -myscript-pen-width:1.6;
    }
        2. use/select your thickness sub style like this: 
             widget.setInkThickness("primitiveMyThickness");
        Returns:
        true if thickness sub style is applied or false if style is invalid, in this case current thickness sub style will be unchanged.

      • setInkDashed

        void setInkDashed(boolean dashed)
        Dash aspect for the ink.
        Parameters:
        dashed - false: The ink is not dashed (default). true: The ink is dashed. The default value of this property is false.

      • setOnConfigureListener

        void setOnConfigureListener(GeometryWidgetApi.OnConfigureListener listener)
        Register a callback to be invoked at the beginning and end of a configuration process.
        Parameters:
        listener - Listener to attach to this widget.
        See Also:
        GeometryWidgetApi.OnConfigureListener

      • registerCertificate

        boolean registerCertificate(byte[] certificate)
        Register the certificate to use the Geometry Widget.

        This function is non-blocking and returns immediately.

        Parameters:
        certificate - Byte array containing the certificate.
        Returns:
        true if the certificate is registered or false on failure or if a certificate is already registered.

      • addSearchDir

        void addSearchDir(String directoryName)
        Define the location of the equation recognition resources.

        The geometry recognition resources are normally loaded automatically from default application data location: Application bundled data directory

        You can choose to load the geometry recognition resource from a different path using this function.

        Parameters:
        directoryName - directoryName to shape resources

      • clearSearchPath

        void clearSearchPath()
        Clear the search directories list.

      • configure

        void configure(String bundleName,
               String config)
        Configure the geometry recognition engine.

        This function is non-blocking and returns immediately.

        Configuration is a lengthy process that may take up to several seconds, depending on the shape resource attached. It is recommended to setup a configure listener to detect the end of the configuration process.

        Parameters:
        bundleName - Name of the configuration bundle, (for example, "shape").
        config - Name of the configuration mode, (for example, "standard").
        See Also:
        GeometryWidgetApi.OnConfigureListener

      • release

        void release()
        Release current engine.

      • getErrorString

        String getErrorString()
        Return a string describing the error that happened during the configuration, if any.
        Returns:
        String describing the error.

      • setOnRecognitionListener

        void setOnRecognitionListener(GeometryWidgetApi.OnRecognitionListener listener)
        Register a callback to be invoked at the beginning and end of a recognition session.
        Parameters:
        listener - The listener to attach to this widget.
        See Also:
        GeometryWidgetApi.OnRecognitionListener

      • serialize

        byte[] serialize()
        Serialize the current input and result as a byte array.
        Returns:
        the corresponding byte array. Only readable using unserialize(byte[]).

      • unserialize

        boolean unserialize(byte[] data)
        Restore an input and recognition result saved using serialize() method.
        Parameters:
        data - the byte array to unserialize, provided by serialize().
        Returns:
        true on success, false otherwise

      • penDown

        void penDown(com.myscript.atk.core.CaptureInfo captureInfo)
        Triggers a pen down.
        Parameters:
        captureInfo - The pen down position. 
         struct CaptureInfo
 {
 float x;   // x coordinate
 float y;   // y coordinate
 float f;   // f pressure
 float w;   // w width
 int64_t t; // t timestamp (millisecond)
 };

      • penUp

        void penUp(com.myscript.atk.core.CaptureInfo captureInfo)
        Triggers a pen up.
        Parameters:
        captureInfo - The pen up position. 
         struct CaptureInfo
 {
 float x;   // x coordinate
 float y;   // y coordinate
 float f;   // f pressure
 float w;   // w width
 int64_t t; // t timestamp (millisecond)
 };

      • penMove

        void penMove(com.myscript.atk.core.CaptureInfo captureInfo)
        Triggers a pen move.
        Parameters:
        captureInfo - The pen move position. 
         struct CaptureInfo
 {
 float x;   // x coordinate
 float y;   // y coordinate
 float f;   // f pressure
 float w;   // w width
 int64_t t; // t timestamp (millisecond)
 };

        Triggers a pen abort.

      • addStroke

        void addStroke(List<com.myscript.atk.core.CaptureInfo> points)
        Adds a stroke to the MyScript document model.
        Parameters:
        points - Points of the stroke. 
         struct CaptureInfo
 {
 float x;   // x coordinate
 float y;   // y coordinate
 float f;   // f pressure
 float w;   // w width
 int64_t t; // t timestamp (millisecond)
 };

        See Also:
        GeometryWidgetApi.OnPenListener

      • clear

        void clear(boolean allowUndo)
        Clear the ink and all geometry objects like redo stack. This also clears the screen.
        Parameters:
        allowUndo - Indicates whether the undo stack must be updated with a clear step.

      • isEmpty

        boolean isEmpty()
        Indicate whether the widget content is empty or not.
        Returns:
        true if widget content is empty.

      • setPalmRejectionEnabled

        void setPalmRejectionEnabled(boolean enabled)
        Enable or disable palm rejection. Enabled by default.
        Parameters:
        enabled - The new enabled or disabled state.

      • setPalmRejectionLeftHanded

        void setPalmRejectionLeftHanded(boolean leftHanded)
        Set palm rejection as left or right handed. Right handed by default.
        Parameters:
        leftHanded - true for a left handed palm rejection configuration. Right handed by default.

      • setOnUndoRedoListener

        void setOnUndoRedoListener(GeometryWidgetApi.OnUndoRedoListener listener)
        Register callbacks to be invoked when at least one of Undo/Redo stacks has changed.
        Parameters:
        listener - The listener to attach to this widget.
        See Also:
        GeometryWidgetApi.OnUndoRedoListener

      • canUndo

        boolean canUndo()
        Return true if undo stack is not empty, false otherwise.
        Returns:
        true if undo stack is not empty, false otherwise.

        void undo()
        Perform one step undo

      • canRedo

        boolean canRedo()
        Return true if redo stack is not empty, false otherwise.
        Returns:
        true if redo stack is not empty, false otherwise.

        Perform one step redo

      • getEnabledConstraints

        int getEnabledConstraints(GeometryWidgetApi.ConstraintBehavior behavior)
        Return the constraints for which the specified behavior is active.
        Parameters:
        behavior - The behavior
        Returns:
        An integer bit mask that determines the constraints for which the specified behavior is active.

      • setEnabledConstraints

        void setEnabledConstraints(boolean enabled,
                           int constraints,
                           GeometryWidgetApi.ConstraintBehavior behavior)
        Enable or disable detection and display of implicit and explicit constraints. Use this method to enable or disable detection and display of implicit and explicit constraints. For example, to enable display of explicit angle equalities and perpendicularities, call: 
          geometryWidget.setConstraints(ConstraintAngleValue.getValue() | ConstraintPerpendicularity.getValue(),
  ConstraintBehaviorExplicitDisplay);
        Parameters:
        enabled - A boolean specifying if the constraints should be enabled or disabled
        constraints - An integer bit mask that determines the affected constraints
        behavior - The affected behavior

      • getResultAsImage

        Bitmap getResultAsImage()
        Get the recognition result as an image.
        Returns:
        Bitmap preview of the result.
